scripts.heroku-postbuild: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "cd backend && npm install" "cd frontend && npm install && npm run build"
scripts.setup: npm i && husky install && npm --prefix ./frontend i && npm --prefix ./backend i
scripts.dev2: concurrently -n front,back -c green,yellow -t "HH:mm:ss" -p "{name} {time}" "npm --prefix ./frontend run dev" "npm --prefix ./backend run dev"
scripts.lint: npm --prefix ./frontend run lint && npm --prefix ./backend run lint
scripts.fix: npm --prefix ./frontend run fix && npm --prefix ./backend run fix
